name: OR_CASE_ORDER_COMMENT_TXT
description: This table contains the ordering comment from the case request order when the case is created from an order.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ORDER_COMMENT_TXT
columns.description: This column contains the ordering comment from the case request order when the case is created from an order.
